Got it! No need fore help.
Det saknas filer på den här fimen. Files ar missing on this film.

Thank you! There are no files missing. This is the whole film of 3h 23 min, with no reduced quality. Burns easily to a dual-layer 8.5 Giga DVD without any error messages from Nero. Extras are provided on a separate disc not included in this upload.
